description: Grassy, sage filled open hills/mountains. One steepish descent that is off-camber in spots. Otherwise, a flowy trail bankcut into slope. Be aware of rattlesnakes here.
directions: Climb up Batchelor Dr. Follow up staying left. Just past 3km marker, turn left. Through gate and follow to first intersection. Take furthest left trail of three. Climb up to next intersection. Stay right. Next intersection, stay right again. Descend down to fence line. Turn left and continue to stay left until back where you started.
title: Rattlesnake
